member.name: SYNCMGR_ITEM_CAPABILITIES
member.summary: Specifies the actions that can be performed against an item.

member.name: SYNCMGR_ITEM_CAPABILITIES.SYNCMGR_ICM_PROVIDES_ICON
member.summary: The item returns a valid object from when that method is called with the SYNCMGR_OBJECTID_Icon flag.

member.name: SYNCMGR_ITEM_CAPABILITIES.SYNCMGR_ICM_EVENT_STORE
member.summary: The item returns a valid object from when that method is called with the SYNCMGR_OBJECTID_EventStore flag.

member.name: SYNCMGR_ITEM_CAPABILITIES.SYNCMGR_ICM_CONFLICT_STORE
member.summary: The item returns a valid object from when that method is called with the SYNCMGR_OBJECTID_ConflictStore flag.

member.name: SYNCMGR_ITEM_CAPABILITIES.SYNCMGR_ICM_CAN_DELETE
member.summary: The user is allowed to delete the item from the handler's folder. This can be used by an item to remove itself from the handler's sync set (for instance, remove a folder from the set of Offline Files). If this value is set, the Delete task is shown in the handler's folder when this item is selected.

member.name: SYNCMGR_ITEM_CAPABILITIES.SYNCMGR_ICM_CAN_BROWSE_CONTENT
member.summary: The item returns a valid object from when that method is called with the SYNCMGR_OBJECTID_BrowseContent flag. If this value is set, the Browse Content task is added to the item's shortcut menu.

member.name: SYNCMGR_ITEM_CAPABILITIES.SYNCMGR_ICM_QUERY_BEFORE_ENABLE
member.summary: The item returns a valid object from when that method is called with the SYNCMGR_OBJECTID_QueryBeforeEnable flag.

member.name: SYNCMGR_ITEM_CAPABILITIES.SYNCMGR_ICM_QUERY_BEFORE_DISABLE
member.summary: The item returns a valid object from when that method is called with the SYNCMGR_OBJECTID_QueryBeforeDisable flag.

member.name: SYNCMGR_ITEM_CAPABILITIES.SYNCMGR_ICM_QUERY_BEFORE_DELETE
member.summary: The item returns a valid object from when that method is called with the SYNCMGR_OBJECTID_QueryBeforeDelete flag.

member.name: SYNCMGR_ITEM_CAPABILITIES.SYNCMGR_ICM_VALID_MASK
member.summary: A mask used to retrieve valid flags.
